alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 05 at 5:53AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...High surf will wash to the top of the beach. Tides will be 2 to 3 feet above normal high tides. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Valuables on the beach will be washed away. Wood and other debris may be washed up above normal high tide line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds to 40 mph will cause waves to wash to the top of the beach. People with valuables on the beach should move them inland to higher ground tonight. The highest surf will be on south facing shores.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
